id.dldescription: Unique Id of the Milking Result

milkingEventId.dldescription: Unique Id of the milking event

quarterType.dldescription: Which Quarter this Milking result is for (Front-Left, Front-Right, Rear-Left, Rear-Right or None)

bottleIdentifer.dldescription: Unique Id of the bottle (vial) used

bottlePosition.dldescription: positioning of the bottle (vial) in the sample rack

concentrate.dldescription: Amount of concentrate given on SampleDate in Kg

measureDeviceId.dldescription: Id of the measuring device used

milkingBoxNumber.dldescription: Id of the milkbox in (AMS unit)

milkWeight.dldescription: Weight of the milk from this milking

averageFlowRate.dldescription: The average flow rate of the milk in Kg/min

maxFlowRate.dldescription: The max flow rate of the milk in Kg/min
